DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine whether use standard treatment conjunction suction improve acne scar compare standard treatment alone .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 Have bilateral roll acne scar Are good health Subject willingness ability understand provide inform consent use tissue communicate investigator .
